    • Method Detail

      • createDeployment

        @RequestMapping(value="/native",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
@Deprecated
public Deployment createDeployment(@RequestBody
                                                                 Definitions definitions,
                                                                 @RequestParam
                                                                 String name,
                                                                 @RequestParam(value="bpmn2",required=false)
                                                                 boolean bpmn2)
        Deprecated. 
        Create or update a workflow in native JPDL.
        Parameters:
        source - A valid JPDL 4.4 workflow document
        name - The name of the deployment. By convention this should be the same as the "name" attribute of the process element.
        bpmn2 - Future capability; not currently implemented. Set to true if the workflow is in BPMN 2.0 format.
        Returns:
        a Deployment object as XML

        @RequestMapping(method=GET)
@ResponseBody
public Deployments listDeployments()
                            throws Exception
        Retrieve all deployments
        Returns:
        a Deployments object, which wraps multiple Deployment objects
        Throws:
        Exception

      • deleteDeployment

        @RequestMapping(value="/{id}",
                method=DELETE)
public void deleteDeployment(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                   String id,
                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Delete a Deployment. A deployment cannot be deleted if it has running executions
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the deployment
        response - 204 if successful, 404 if not found
